args.name: apiKey
args.info: apiKey from Steam

args.name: language
args.info: The ISO639-1 language code for the language all tokenized strings should be returned in. Not all strings have been translated to every language. If a language does not have a string, the English string will be returned instead. If this parameter is omitted the string token will be returned for the strings.

blocks.name: getLiveLeagueGames
blocks.description: A list of in-progress league matches, as well as details of that match as it unfolds.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: apiKey from Steam

args.name: apiKey
args.info: apiKey from Steam

args.name: matchId
args.info: Id of the match

blocks.name: getMatchHistory
blocks.description: A list of matches, filterable by various parameters.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: apiKey from Steam

args.name: heroId
args.info: A list of hero IDs can be found via the GetHeroes method.

args.name: gameMode
args.info: 0 - None 1 - All Pick 2 - Captain's Mode 3 - Random Draft 4 - Single Draft 5 - All Random  6 - Intro  7 - Diretide 8 - Reverse Captain's Mode 9 - The Greeviling 10 - Tutorial 11 - Mid Only 12 - Least Played 13 - New Player Pool 14 - Compendium Matchmaking 16 - Captain's Draft

args.name: skill
args.info: Skill bracket for the matches (Ignored if an account ID is specified). 0 - Any 1 - Normal 2 - High 3 - Very High

args.name: minPlayers
args.info: Minimum amount of players in a match for the match to be returned.

args.name: accountId
args.info: 32-bit account ID.

args.name: leagueId
args.info: Only return matches from this league. A list of league IDs can be found via the GetLeagueListing method.

args.name: startAtMatchId
args.info: Start searching for matches equal to or older than this match ID.

args.name: matchesRequested
args.info: Amount of matches to include in results (default: 25).

args.name: tournamentGamesOnly
args.info: Whether to limit results to tournament matches. (0 = false, 1 = true)

blocks.name: getMatchHistoryBySequenceNum
blocks.description: A list of matches ordered by their sequence num.

args.name: apiKey
args.info: apiKey from Steam

args.name: startAtMatchSeqNum
args.info: The match sequence number to start returning results from.

args.name: matchesRequested
args.info: Amount of matches to include in results (default: 25).

args.name: dateMin
